column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I am a member of the Art Institute of Chicago
column2: and I just wish I could go more often. I love to go after work on the late-hours day
column3: as it is less busy than during the weekends. The permanent collection is wonderful and diverse
column5: too many famous artworks to mention
column6: and peculiarities like collections of miniature rooms and paperweights. Check for blockbuster shows that require special ticketed entry. Check out the gift shop and take a photo of the lions.
